title: why geth nodes in v1.8.23 can't start?
body:
hi,
    we update node from v1.8.13 to v1.8.23:only update the client .Starting  with 

`geth --datadir=/data/eth --rpcapi eth,web3,personal,utils,net,miner --rpc --syncmode "fast" --port 30304 --rpcport 8545 --rpcaddr "0.0.0.0" --debug` ,but the node is failure  with the error 
```
INFO [03-08|16:44:28.408|core/tx_journal.go:114]         Loaded local transaction journal         transactions=0 dropped=0
INFO [03-08|16:44:28.408|core/tx_journal.go:166]         Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [03-08|16:44:28.420|p2p/enode/localnode.go:240]     New local node record                    seq=2 id=1eb367ae9cbef313 ip=127.0.0.1 udp=30304 tcp=30304
INFO [03-08|16:44:28.420|p2p/server.go:605]              Started P2P networking                   self=enode://62bb14d9b6058c82dd8397e487697ef6d00ac90b0ccfbc5ffda837ce923fd4ab98a6892bd540662b8952f608d27a71c089fb5396a980b58bedc68c4d2b43e698@127.0.0.1:30304
INFO [03-08|16:44:28.422|node/node.go:315]               IPC endpoint opened                      url=/data/eth/geth.ipc
INFO [03-08|16:44:28.422|node/node.go:343]               HTTP endpoint opened                     url=http://0.0.0.0:8545 cors= vhosts=localhost
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.446|cmd/utils/cmd.go:75]            Got interrupt, shutting down... 
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.446|node/node.go:358]               HTTP endpoint closed                     url=http://0.0.0.0:8545
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.447|node/node.go:325]               IPC endpoint closed                      url=/data/eth/geth.ipc
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.447|core/blockchain.go:727]         Blockchain manager stopped 
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.447|eth/handler.go:227]             Stopping Ethereum protocol 
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.447|eth/handler.go:248]             Ethereum protocol stopped 
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.447|core/tx_pool.go:470]            Transaction pool stopped 
INFO [03-08|16:44:33.448|ethdb/database.go:148]          Database closed                          database=/data/eth/geth/chaindata
```

This is invoked here:  https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/master/cmd/utils/cmd.go#L75 . Something is sending a `syscall.SIGINT` or `syscall.SIGTERM` to it. I see no evidence of an error above.
